name: test_e2e_with_logs[069_SQLI_ERROR_012]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_012` |
| **Name** | PostgreSQL conditional cast error |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT CASE WHEN (1=1) THEN CAST(version() AS int) ELSE 1 END) --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20CASE%20WHEN%20%281%3D1%29%20THEN%20CAST%28version%28%29%20AS%20int%29%20ELSE%201%20END%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~12000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:02:00.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_012-1769860920684-djji9l pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_012 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20CASE%20WHEN%20%281%3D1%29%20THEN%20CAST%28version%28%29%20AS%20int%29%20ELSE%201%20END%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_012-1769860920684-djji9l pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_012 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20CASE%20WHEN%20%281%3D1%29%20THEN%20CAST%28version%28%29%20AS%20int%29%20ELSE%201%20END%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
